name: Kamal khan
review: It's very cool looking, feels solid. But if you're going to gamble on size, buy straight from their site. I'm a 3X, their largest size, and the product was easily perfect for a 1X.

name: Jamal
review: Ordered this for my teenage son. He had been eyeing a higher priced version. To say he likes it would be an understatement. He loves this hoodie. He is five 3 and ordered the small.

name: Razu Ahamad
review: It's very cool looking, feels solid. But if you're going to gamble on size, buy straight from their site.  He loves this hoodie. He is five 3 and ordered the small.

name: Borkot
review: It looks pretty cool, right? Halfway between a knight and a ninja, maybe? Well, besides the lack of pockets and it is a pullover rather than a zip-up... it' not really worth my money.

name: Khan Muhammad
review: I absolutely love my knight hoodieðŸ˜Šits very resistant to cold,wind and rain.Its very good material so its super warm and looks like body armor while being super light weight.

name: Rubayat
review: I bought these for my brother and his girlfriend for Christmas because they both are University of Central Florida Alumni, Home of the Knights, well they live in Houston.
